_comment_cli: EAS CLI version requirement. Ensure you have eas-cli >= 12.0.0 installed globally.
_comment_build: EAS Build profiles for different environments. Each profile has specific environment variables and distribution settings.

build._comment_development: DEVELOPMENT: Used for local development with Expo Go / development client. Internal distribution only.

env._comment: Local API URL - update if backend runs on different port

build._comment_preview: PREVIEW: Used for internal testing (TestFlight, internal APK). Connect to staging backend.

env._comment: Staging API - update with your actual staging URL before use

build._comment_production: PRODUCTION: Used for App Store / Play Store releases. Connect to production backend. NEVER hardcode secrets here.

env._comment: Production API - ensure this matches your live backend

_comment_submit: EAS Submit configuration for store submissions. Configure app-specific passwords and service accounts before first submission.

production._comment_ios: iOS: Requires App Store Connect API key or app-specific password. See https://docs.expo.dev/submit/ios/
production._comment_android: Android: Requires Google Play service account JSON key. See https://docs.expo.dev/submit/android/
